content.detailedDescription:
The incident took place in early august of 2008 in southern california; in a section of the city of whittier called "up-town".
i was at my girlfriends apartment located on the 2nd floor, on the north side of greenleaf ave., adjacent to a hill and hiking trail. it was a little after 12:30am, my girlfriend and i had an argument, then i went to lay down in her bedroom, while she remained in the living room on the couch with our cat.
i remember laying down on her bed and closing my eyes; i had a strange dream about being locked in a submarine trapped in ice when i heard the door open.
i immediately jumped out of bed, and all the hair on my neck stood up as i watched.
then i heard and felt a humming noise, that was so low and deep that it made me a bit nauseated. 
my heart stared racing as the door continued to open, and then, standing there in the hall was a small figure around 4ft tall that was dressed in what seemed like a black cloak. in shock, i tried to scream out and grab something from the nightstand next to me to try and defend my self in some way, but i went mute, and felt like i was paralyzed. it raised its hand and was holding something in it.
i fell and crippled down to the bed not being able to move, 2-3 more of the small figures cloaked in black entered the room, in a sort of ,hurried waddle, and surrounded me.
i couldnt move, and all i could do was stare at the first small humanoid figure that was pointing something at me. it had hands, or what looked like hands. the skin color was dark, a brownish green; then the last thing i saw was its face as it stepped closer towards me. its eyes where big and yellowish with slits like a cat or reptile. its skin on its face was a bit lighter color then its hands, it had no hair, i didnt really see a nose, just slits where the nostrils should be, and its teeth where jagged and pointy in a small child like mouth. it said something in a low gutteral voice that i couldnt understand, it sounded like someone talking underwater, then i looked back at the clock, it said 1:30 am, then it all went black. the next thing i know im laying in bed staring at the ceiling. i go to sit up and i have a sharp pain in my left lower back, i turn to look at the clock and it said 4:30 am, then the humming noise came back and a bright light perred in from the 2nd floor window, i opened the blinds to look out and i saw a teardropped shaped craft with a dome hovering in mid air about 10 ft from the window. it was about 20ft long. it had lights of red, orange, blue and mainly white on the sides and underneath i saw what looked like landing equipment. it hovered there for about 3-5 seconds, then the humming noise dissappered,and it became silent as it floated slowly up past the trees and vanished out of my sight. i was confussed more then terrified and felt dizzy and disorented. i walked out of the room and saw my girlfrined laying on the couch, asleep, with the cat hidding curled up in a ball, with all of its hair standing up hissing in the direction of the front door.
i tried to wake my girlfriend as i ran past to the door, but she was in a dead sleep. excitied still, i ran out of the door and down the stairs to the street below our window where i saw the craft drift away to see if i could see where it went in the sky. but it was gone. i went back into the house when my girlfreind started to wake up and the cat was now calm and walking around the kitchen. i told her what happened and about everything i felt and saw. she did'nt remember seeing anything, just seeing the clock on the cable tv box say 1am, and then she told me she got really tired out of no where and it all went black. i asked her to check my lower left back for any marks, when she did she found a small red spot that was slightly hot and a little swollen .I never saw anything like that again, but i still have nightmares sometimes about it, and i still have a small scar.
i don't know how else to explain what happened to me.
this is just what i remember.
content.summary: I witnessed ufo, and pressence of small

content.detailedDescription:
It was july 14th 2013, i was walking back home after having dinner with my parents at their house and wanted to get back quickly so i could get online to talk to my girlfriend. i always walk the same route when going from my parents to home as it cuts across a lot of the town and makes for a quick walk home. it's also quite high up and there are clear areas along the route where you can see out across the town, the harbor and even the whole bay itself.
on this night it was a lovely crystal clear sky. in some places along my route there is very little lighting and in some cases no street lights at all leaving the road in complete darkness, allowing one a completely clear view of the sky and all the stars, something that is rarely achievable in the town with all the bright light.
being a bit of an amateur astronomer since i was a kid i welcomed any chance i could get to see a brilliant clear sky with little light around and so took what chances i had to gaze up as i walked.
i reached another dark stretch of road and had a clear view to the south west across the whole bay, i stopped a moment to pull out my phone to select some music on the music player as i had been listening to some on my way back as was my usual routine. i noted the time was 2230 and had been walking about 10-15 minutes and put the phone away. it was at that moment that i looked up at the clear sky again in a southern direction and noticed a single bright star. even now i don't know why i looked up then or what made me notice it, but i did. i stared at it a moment and suddenly realized it was moving at a slow pace in a north west direction.
i immediately identified it wasn't an airplane and thought that maybe is was a satellite. amazingly as this came to mind the object suddenly increased in brightness almost like it flared up with a white light, and just as quickly faded into nothing all while moving still.
i was astounded at first and thought that maybe it wasn't a satellite but maybe a meteor or slow moving shooting star and it had burned up, despite it's white light.
a few moments of looking on it reappeared a small distance away from where it had vanished, only it was back to it's original form and now moving up higher across the night sky and towards me, heading north east. it then got even more bizarre!
as i continued to watch it travel in a straight line, waiting to see if it would vanish again, it suddenly performed a strange a seemingly random, yet also impossible, maneuver in various directions before finishing at the exact point it had started the maneuver and continued along it's north eastern direction once more. the maneuver only took a split second and when it happened the light left a quickly dissipating trail behind it, like someone holding a single light in front of you in a blacked out room and moving about quickly in your eyesight, the path burned temporarily in your eyes. i could see still see the bizarre moment in my own eyes for a few seconds after.
as it continued heading north east it eventually came right overhead, suddenly brightened again, and faded into nothing. it was gone for a little while longer this time and thought it was gone for good.
it eventually reappeared a short distance away from where it vanished, but was no longer traveling in a straight line but in more of a curved path that gradually turned toward the north.
i pulled out my phone, turned off the music player as quick as i could and started the camera function. i tried a few times to snap some pictures and even started recording, desperately hoping i would catch something i could show to someone. as i would find out though the lack of light was no good for the camera phone and it captured nothing but black, and no enhancing on computer would fix that.
as it followed this path it brightened and faded two more times, the final time though it faded much more slowly as it began to vanish over the horizon.
as soon as it was over i checked my phone and noted it had been only five minutes. a sudden feeling of uneasiness and urgency came over me, i suddenly felt very uncomfortable and nervous and immediately made tracks straight back home as fast as i could. as much as i had been in awe and intrigued in what i had been watching i now just had the urgent feeling to get inside, i didn't like being outside no more and contently found myself looking at the sky like i was checking to see if it had come back or if anything else was up there.
i quickly brushed it out of my mind the next day, but when ever i think about it i just get this odd feeling i can't explain that chills me. i guess i would like to get to the bottom of it and see if there is an explanation for it or not.
content.summary: Bright moving star like object that brightened, faded, and reappeared numerous times, and would change direction, sometimes drastically.

content.detailedDescription:
I did some more analysis on the images i shot last night.
a quick recap: last night i saw a bright light shoot across colorado springs from east to west. when it got to the west side of the springs, it split into five individual lights and hovered there. it's altitude was lower than pikes peak (i could see the mountain range silhouette behind the light). i ran inside to get a camera, and when i came back out, there was a single light hovering over the mountain range to the south of pikes peak. last night in the dark, i thought it was over cheyenne mountain (which houses the norad facility), but as it turns out, it was hovering over a peak somewhere between pikes peak and cheyenne mountain (i don't know the names of the peaks).
i shot a series of photos on tripod, overexposed, so that i could see the mountain range. i was able to overlay six photos with the peak lined up, to show the object was not stationary (like a bright star would be).
to the naked eye, and in those six photos, the object appeared as a very bright light. 
i then took several photos at a much faster shutter speed to get a proper exposure on the object. for these photos (still on tripod) i used the mirror lock up function and the self-timer to insure there was no camera shake. the details in the round disk object are the real details, not an anomaly caused by camera movement...
there are details, but surprisingly, it doesn't look like anything i've ever seen. 
any ideas???
content.summary: Bright light traveled east to west, split into five objects. went to get camera, came out and one light hovered over mountains for approx 15 minutes.  obtained photos.

content.detailedDescription: Sitting on my deck steps a couple of weeks before thanksgiving, watching my husband rake leaves and watching the turkey buzzards gliding in the sky. noticed a football shaped object right above the buzzards. thinking to myself it was tilted in such a way it looked like a football and laughed. then i looked to the right and looked at another group of buzzards for about 10 seconds. but i was suddenly curious about the object and wanted to see what shape it really was.  it was gone! i jumped up and yelled at my husband i think something just crashed. i'm standing there looking for signs of smoke. nothing! now my husband is looking at me like i am crazy. i am walking back an forth like a crazy person. thinking if that wasn't a plane what was it? it looked like a football, with a very black area on the bottom, above that was what looked like the sun shining very brightly and the rest looked like stainless steel. i said to my husband it must have been a ufo. i was not prepared for the disbelief i was faced with. so now i call my daughter who lives next door a couple acres away and tell her. i am smacked with disbelief again. wow! an hour later my daughter calls me and tells me to go outside and look at the sky. there were at least a dozen f-16 in the sky. the sky was crisscrossed with their tail smoke. have never seen it look like that before and never seen it look like that since. watched the newspaper and news for days. not a mention of anything. fort bragg is about 20 mi from where i live. i don't like you mufon and only report this cause i promised chris bledsoe i would.
content.summary: Saw it, then it disappeared. hour later doz f16 in sky.

content.detailedDescription:
Came out at 4am to see meteor shower for 2nd consecutive night. 
2 intense bright yellow lights hovered far off over ocean and low. 
far off but bright enough to cast slight reflection off ocean. 
thought it was 2 airplanes or copters, but no flashing lights (like planes have) or red lights (like planes have).
got my binocs but they were too far off to see more than light. 
they met low above the water and then one went south and one disappeared out to sea.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Two bright yellow orbs hovered together far off over ocean

content.detailedDescription: Walking home from my shift at work when a tingly sensation came over me. i looked up and saw numerous balls or orb like lights in the sky. i then felt sick and faint but kept focus on them. i tried to move but could not. there approx 10 orbs hovering above then slightly away from me, before the moved off quietly to the se. i have seen many orbs or spheres out over the lake over the years, but most of these were not ufos but were lanterns. i take medication for ocd and thought this may be making me see things as my mind gets full of silly ideas and thoughts. but this was real and i think it was aliens trying to communicate with me as i seem to have missed about eleven mins of time. i think there is an alien base under the lake and i have swam in it many times looking for it. but the aliens won't come and see me yet.
content.summary: Numerous orbs in sky got my attention then i lost about 11 mins of time

content.detailedDescription: As i was sitting in truck looking towards east-northeast sky at about 7pm on the night 12-14-2013. i observed a distant light,bright undefined shape or size in sky at aprox 45 degrees to the east sky 2-3 miles out as it appeared from edge of building i was parked by, at first glance thought distant plane or chopper. as continued to watch it moving cross sky the object was coming in low, fast and moving in straight path towards the nwest best guess 1000-1500 ft. above ground over the middle of my city. as it approuched a closer path cross my field of vision i then saw a trailing unknown red blinking object in the same flight path that appeared to be trailing or chasing the first object,the 2nd light at that point appeared to be a air craft of some kind? at this moment maby a minute into wathcing what was happening in the sky i was still in truck,as was bout 17 for temp outside. this is the moment when i realized i was not seeing what my mind first tells you is normal,so i then got out of truck to see and then actually hear the roar of a jet type engine in the sky in direction of the objects still in the flight path of now almost above my area i was parked.The first object was brighter and more vivid,shapeless,but its light was coming from all around it,no edges? but still in same position and distance to ground and height of angle with the second red single blinking object still chasing but not gaining on it, this is when i could tell that it was a blacked out helicopter,no other lights that could be seen in or around what im sure was a blackhawk or other kind of  helicopter. the roar of the engine sounded to be at max thrust, i at this point in watching got that eerie feeling i was encountering a ufo being chased by a manmade craft trying to be stealthy in pursuit,this about 3-4 min into this sighting the 2 objects continuied off nwest of the city passing over the downtown area and into the night horizon 3-4 miles out of my sight in the direction of the army national guard about 10 miles that direction. i am very puzzled of the entire event and can't stop thinking about or analyzing the things i saw and heard. this is not my first encounter with such an event i could'nt explain.
content.summary: Fast moving bright starlike cross clear nitesky being pursued military chopper

content.detailedDescription: My friend and i were driving to his house when we saw two red-orange lights hovering in the sky. they at first appeared to be right over a hill  we were passing, but then seemed very far away. as we drove, pulled over to watch them and saw another person pulled over. i exited the car and paced when the person in the other car asked me "what do you think that is?" i told him i didn't know. as i went back to watching the ufo's, i noticed they were moving away at an alarming rate, orbiting each other and moving back and forth. eventually, they left our field of vision.
content.summary: Two red-orange lights observed flying in formation in night sky above hill, then flying out of sight into stars.

content.detailedDescription: Call me at this 513 253 6736it my story is very long
content.summary: Could see threw it

content.detailedDescription: About 4:45pm every clear day since mid october i have been seeing a very bright star like object in the southern sky just south of my location. it is always in the same spot time after time. i begin watching the southern skies about 4:30pm on clear days for it to appear. i focus on one specific spot and like clock work it suddenly just "appears" out of nowhere. when i first witnessed this phenomena i thought i was seeing things, but i have since had my uncle and my wife both watch for it with me and they have seen this thing do the same thing. it will first appear as a small bright dot about 45 degrees up over the southern horizon. this lead me to believe at first it was the planet venus. however, after watching it for 2 hours straight for several nights in a row (with binoculars) i noticed it moving in an arc from 45 degrees to tree top level which is about 5 degrees since i have hill all around me. as it descended in an arc it would intensify in brightness and get much, much closer. the best way to describe it is as a very bright triangle. i viewed it when it was at its lowest and brightest through binoculars. from what i could make out it was a triangle shape with very large whitest blue lights on the three corners. in the middle of the bottom it had a large red light that pulsated. around the edges it was covered with what appeared to be windows that had extremely bright blue lights inside. the whole thing was so bright you could barely stare at it. then it would slowly spin clockwise and vary in brightness. it would also shoot out a beam of light from each corner, like a huge spotlight, but it could vary the angle of the light, sometimes it pointed downward, sometimes sideways. it would also ascend, and then suddenly descend while continuing to rotate clockwise around the center red light. during the viewing of this object i have witnessed several aircraft also in the area of the object. a couple of times the object seemed to have fighter jets pursuing it, or at least they where accompanying it. as the object descends it finally goes dim, all lights go out you can make out a dark triangular surface. it will then just zip off and disappear. sometimes it will appear in the morning around 5:30aam and do the same motions, always suddenly appearing out of nowhere and dimming before it zips away. please mufon send someone up here to witness and photograph this thing! this has been going on for at least two months now.
content.summary: Huge bright star like triangle keeps appearing in southern sky

content.detailedDescription: My friend and i were standing in his backyard, and i caught a glimpse of a bright light with a weird tint to it, kind of a yellowish green tint. i want to say it was star-like, it was not a shooting star. my friend  saw it at the last second but i had at least a  solid 3 second visual on it. i waited for it to come out the other side of the cloud it flew into and it never came out the other side. the weather conditions that night would not be good for flying so it was kind of odd to see anything in the sky. i have never had a ufo encounter before, nor had i been a believer.
content.summary: Fast, low flying bright light.

content.detailedDescription: I was walking down my parents driveway with my older brother to get on the school bus, the drive is approximately one quarter of a mile long and the bus picked us up a little after 7 in the morning. over the years i have been careful not to speculate as to what i saw too much for fear of tainting the memory of the event. i have several events that i can not explain but this event is the only in which i witnessed something unexplainable to me. as i said my older brother and i were walking down the drive to the bus when one of us noticed an object hovering in a small woods approximately 500 yards from us across and down the road. at this time i cannot with 100% certainty say which one of us saw the object first but i am about 80% sure it was my brother. please understand this was a long time ago and i have tried to focus on the more important details of the event over the years. i believe my brother said something to the effect of "do you see that?" i said "yea that's the sun" he said "no that way is west" or something to that effect and i looked to the east and saw the sun just beginning to rise. a more appropriate direction for the object would be nw. we then speculated that it was the moon but after looking around the sky for a few seconds we spotted the moon more or less directly above us. this whole dialogue took about 45 seconds to a minute, during that time i was looking at the sun rising and trying to find the moon so i cannot say what the object was doing but i can say that it was in roughly the same place as when i was first alerted to it. the object was approximately 18 to 22 feet in diameter and looked like the sun rising or the moon when it's orange. i came to that estimate by judging its size to the trees it was in. i say in because i could see trees in front of and behind the object quite clearly. the object hovered for about 20 to 30 seconds and then began to move though the trees from left to right. it covered about 150 yards at what i would call a pretty slow pace all the while i could still clearly see trees behind of and in front of the object. it's travel took 45 seconds to a minute and covered about two thirds of the woods, then it disappeared instantly. no fading or anything it was just gone. i really didn't have an emotional response to the event, i was more perplexed as to what it was i was seeing. i do have to say that i had this feeling like it belonged there, like it was normal. my brother and i have talked about it several times over the years and has both of us stumped. i would like to add that i am an open minded skeptic and would need to explore every possible natural explanation before i would even begin to think it was anything but. thank you for your time
content.summary: Orange circle traveling through small woods

content.detailedDescription: I was outside my house in glen waverley when i noticed how clear the night is i always stare at the stars when i saw i what i thought was the brightest shooting star ascending  from the ground level to the stars at rapid pace leaving a trail behind. it was moving very fast and appeared to have just vanished into the dark sky it happened so quickly i was truly amazed at the speed there was no sound my first thought was "do shooting stars fly in that direction" i wanted to inform somebody about this in the hope of some sort of information about this event and did anybody else see it. i really feel as though i may have witnessed something truly amazing , i really just want to know if anybody else saw this or even somehow managed to record it. i do have the greatest skyline view from my house and this is the first time ive seen anything like this! rob.
content.summary: A bright shooting star heading towards the sky that changed speed

content.detailedDescription:
We were at the front of our house observing very unusual weather patterns. there was a thunderstorm approaching and the sky was charged with electricity and there were strange colours in the atmosphere with rainbows.
the time was sunset.
three of us observed a black object almost directly overhead which was triangular (bell shaped) and looked like a bunch of grapes moving steadily through the air from east to west at a constant speed.
we all were excited because it truly was a ufo in the sense that none of us could remember seeing anything like it in the sky before.
i took a quick photo before it disappeared behind clouds
content.summary: Three witnesses watched a black bell shaped object that looked like a bunch of grapes move from east to west and then disappeared behind storm clouds

content.altitude: Landed, Treetop, 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
I was home. nearly every night i go outside and take sky pics.  supposed to be a pink moon tonight - so i went looking for it.  there was no moon.  as i do on pic nights, i waved at a bright star and said "hey you guys - where is the moon - you forgot the moon.   i waved and they waved back expressing joy to see me.  i turned about looking for the moon - there it was at the old smelter stack on the ground and rising. ginormous and pink!  i knew the moon could not truly be there as the mountains close off the stack.  i took a few pics...Was amazed! watched the beauty of the unfolding intense neon pink. i snapped a few pics and thanked my star buddies for such an opportunity to view this event!  they responded by dancing and i felt a kinship of joy....While fully realizing that i may be dealing with demons. there are only a few pics from this event. i was lost in absorbed time.  seems to me that i went somewhere to perform my duty, to attend, and observe, and learn, and teach.   

upon pic review i noticed many new images:
     ant like creatures that would be about 80 feet tall if they stood up 
     or: are they many small creatures in formations?

     gold  or plutonium extraction
     
     pink point grid to lower light/ not light cast onto stack

     large wings seem possible

     mas movement in one shutter click on ground only where extraction 
     occurred.

     some pics in this group show a large swelling of the base of the 
     stack.

     one  daytime pic has a 50 foot ghost attached to the  high-up 
     outside of the stack with a buddy ghost whirl on the ground.  

gold orbs move about.  they have a red-violet bird like creature inside---
     which looks like a phoenix  to me.  orbs are very curious and will   
     come closer to inspect me.  they are attracted by a lawrence welk 
     mouth popping sound.

the "moon" rose into the clouds while casting a gorgeous pink luster into
    the velvet weightless night.  i'm sure i went somewhere....As i       
    have no recall of the ascension of the moon after my photos were 
    taken.
content.summary: Hey stars- where is the moon?Then i saw it at the stack  - pink and enormous .Moon and stars respond to me  by movement of my body and mind.

content.detailedDescription: One night around 10:30p.M. i was outside smoking a cigarette talking to the stars. i just got done watching ancient aliens and was really starting to get upset with myself for actually believing the weird things they say on that show. i look at the brightest star and say in my brain "you bitches ain't real." and walk from the backyard to the side of the house. now here is when my life change. as i throw the newport behind me, floating so silent, was a solid midnight dark triangle with a bright orange light in the middle above my garage. as i look up i tried to wrap my brain around what i was seeing it felt as if i was being studied then the orange light flashed and brighten. this is when fear took over my brain and instead of going to the camera in my phone i stood there for about 15 seconds shaking then i just ran under the garage. i just stood under it for about 7 seconds then i had a feeling like if something was meant to happen it would i mean if it can sneak up on me there's no telling what else it's capable of. so i step out the garage and it finally moves and hover over my head and just continue its route straight for about 6 minutes till in the distance it just look like an orange dot.  i went in the house still shaking and terrified. my girl looked at me and asked what's wrong she actually seen the fear in my eyes and that's something out of 3 years she never seen. ever since then i've had an problem with the dark like i'm not scared of it but i do respect it a whole lot more i'm just so uneasy now it's like i'm always being looked at when the lights off now
content.summary: I was outside when i turned around and seen a black triangular ufo hovering behind me then it just floated so gracefully pass the trees

content.detailedDescription: My supervisor and i were driving home from work in warrington, uk, at 7:10am when to our left we spotted red lights about 1 mile away. the lights started to flash on and off so we decided to pursue it. it it was moving from the direction of stretton towards woolston. we tried to photograph the object but each time we focused in the lights on the object would go off. at one stage we tried to speed up to get in front of it, but it appeared to move much more swiftly than we could. we parked up on the side of the road in woolston to get a clearer look but the object seemed to be using the trees to limit our observations. this object could move like nothing i've ever seen before in my life. it was very controlled in all its movements no matter in which direction it wanted to go. it appeared to have the ability to perform a sidewards change of direction without pause from the forward direction it was going in. after approximately seven minutes of observing the object it started to move away from the trees northwards of the direction we were observing it from.Our attention was first drawn to the red lights of the object over a field which we have passed on a great number of occasions, and never before have we seen any coloured lights in that particular direction. we both got the feeling of surrealism and just wanted to get as close as possible to the object. we lost sight of the object as it started move back away from the trees at an extraordinary pace then we looked at each other and when we looked back to where we last seen it, it was gone.
content.summary: Red blinking lights, looked like the back of a sleigh. followed it for 2 miles in van.Kind of triangular

content.detailedDescription: It was dec 9,2012 me and my friends were coming back from a birthday dinner.We get get back from the dinner and i notice a very bright star or plane but i notice it moving faster than anything i seen before including amazing fight path changes.I had a feeling it was not normal felt diffrent .At first it was in the sky above mt hamilton hills at a stand still then i noticed it moving very quick in all directions its light would dim flicker then it would show up in another area it did this multiple times.It even seemed to land on mt hamilton and was not able to be seen again .My first action was to record it on video ,my feelngs were calm as if i were waiting for a ride back to my planet.My thaught after seeing and capturing close encounter of the second kind i need to go to top of the hill and see whats out there.I have a stong feeling they live un the woods up atop the hill by the observatory.Greys maybe nordics
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Saw a very bright ball of light move super fast and land in mountains

content.detailedDescription: Standing outside looking south west saw a large diameter white object with no sound, no trail, no streak.It was moving at mach 5++ at a 15 degree down angle.My girlfriend then said oh look and then we saw a second on same spot, same characteristics.We saw two within 2 minutes from each other.They both went out of sight within 3 seconds.I am 57 years old and realized i have actually seen a ufo and not anything else.I know for sure these were alien craft and not man made.Too fast too silent unless black ops has stuff i don't know about. this is the first time in my life i have ever seen what i know for sure , no doubt is a ufo.
content.summary: Round ball @ mach 5++ 15 degree down angle.Slight glow white.No sound no trail.

content.detailedDescription: I was camping in my 4runner in northern california, an woke out of dead sleep looked directly head of me an had this feeling as if something was watching me, and then i  looked up though the trees and saw this triangular shaped craft with lights. as if i was the only one they were studying. i had this overwhelming sensation to get out my truck and meet these brothers it was like i was under hypnosis or a trance it was a very strange feeling.. like i was talking to them using telepathy also. then all i remember is blacking out into a "dream" that i was outside in the woods an they were there telepathically communicating  to me, an i was 20 or so feet from them an there craft an they were challenging me, reading me this scroll that was in a different language, trying to get me to join them. it felt physically an mentally draining the next mooring when i had a woke.
content.summary: Woke out of dead sleep feel as if something was watching me an looked up though the trees and saw theses lights.

content.detailedDescription:
1) i was standing in front of the franconia sports shop.
2) i was looking up at a beautiful moon.
3) i first thought it was perhaps fireworks, airplane, or a flare off in the distance.  i quickly realized it was none of those.
4) balls of light, from my perspective, about the size of a large star or planet, in the night sky appearing at one second intervals at equal distance every time.  the lights lasted half a second.  it was on one trajectory at first from se to nw and they progressed with sequential flashes 10 or 12 times across the sky.  it then stopped (disappeared) for a few seconds, and then reappeared headed at about an 85 degree angle ne but still in the sw sky.  6 or 8 more lights appeared and then stopped almost directly above me. it was clear with a bright moon and i could see no stars though i was in a village with some surface lighting. that drew my attention as well as i am a star gazer and know the effects of ambient, surface light pollution.  once it was gone, i listened for aircraft noise, as the military practices frequently in this area, and there was none.
5) i felt i had seen a ufo, for sure, for the first time in my life.
6) it just quit after the second shorter pass.
note: i thought about going into the shop and bringing out others to witness this but i was so taken that i did not.  i may be the only witness to this event.  i was sober and am a responsible person well respected internationally in my profession which is music performance and education.  i'm making this report because of the credibility of mufon and your sincere desire to get to the truth about ufo's. i've seen other weird lights in the sky earlier in my life but this was the most dramatic, and strange (compared to what i normally see in the sky). that i have ever witnessed.  for whatever this is worth, i hope that it helps you.  i would like to be kept informed if you figure this out. 

sincerely,

a. kendall betts
content.summary: Sequential flashing single light at one second intervals.  balls of light lasted half second.  10-12 flashes, then changed direction and 6 more.  disappeard.

content.detailedDescription: We were laying out in the front yard looking at stars at around 1am, noticed a light that appeared to be a bright satellite coming from the north and travelling in a southward direction.  the light abruptly changed directions multiple times including 90 degree angle turns, indicating that it was not an orbiting satellite.  we were very excited by this fact, and continued to watch the light as it travelled south, looking for changes in altitude and more change in direction.  after watching this light for about another minute, two more lights, coming from different directions in the sky and rapidly changing direction, joined the first and after much changing of flight paths, all three arranged themselves in a triangular formation and continued southward as the first light had been doing.  this sighting was not of a single craft with multiple lights, but of three separate crafts that formed a triangular flying formation.  we watched the formation continue south until it was obscured by city lights.
content.summary: 1 light appeared from the north, traveling south, which then broke into three lights that formed a triangle shape and continued southward in a triangular formation.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: As i was leaving a local resteruant after supper i observed a strobbing white light which was mostly staying in one spot. most of today and last night there has been freezing rain and sleet mixed with snow. the object was under the cloud cover between the clouds and the ground. i observed this object on and off for the next three hours. i went out about 9:30 and the object had left or had gone up into the clouds. there is a diffuse white to yellow light in the clouds to the south and west but it is mostly all around the area. my dog growled at the object at one point. although i have obseverved him react to other ufo's this is the first time i have ever heard him growl at one. it was a contrast to the other lights that are a stationary tower light which in our area are generally red and blink on and off at regular intervels. what ever  this was it was not a normal human air craft. no piolet in his right mind would be flying in this weather. the altitude was very low and i don't think even a helicopter would have hung around that long in one place.
content.summary: Strobing white lights varied in size and direction but stayed mostly in one spot

content.detailedDescription: Sitting outside on the back porch looking west, noticed three redish orange orbs flame-like travelling from the north to the south then to the west. then there were 2 or 3 more travelling in the same direction followed by 3 more travelling in the same direction followed by 3 more traveled in the same direction with no sounds, no other lights except for red orange lights. spherical shape, hovered in a path and abruptly changed courses. at first i thought it was an alien being a believer of aliens. i was shocked and got my wife, son, and roommate to come see the ufos (12). we later kept losing sight of the ufos because they traveled further away from us into space.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Glowing redish orange orbs floating across the sky travelling from north to south then west

content.detailedDescription: Checking out my diy night vision apparatus last evening and these objects passed overhead. i was inside the house monitoring the video on my computer when the objects appeared. so there was no way i could move the scope to track because of the speed they were traveling.
content.summary: Night vision scope picked up these objects passing overhead.

content.detailedDescription: Went out about 0615 to go to work and as i unplugged truck, noticed a bright light.  this was 2nd of 3 in abut 4 days, grabbed my video and ran 23 sec on camera, would have got more but had to leave for work.  first noticed it about 50 degrees from horizon, and below and to the left of moon, by the time i got camera out it had gone up to about 70 degrees.  i figured it was one of the things i had seen a day or two before, but that was about 730pm.  tried to look for it as i left for work but unable to see it again.  if i may, i would like to describe all 3 that i saw in this 3-4 day period.  first time day or 2 before at about 730 pm as i went to store.  noticed a bright light to s-se about 45 degrees, it came down slowly, and at same time two projections came out, one to the right and one to the bottom as you look at it.  came down at about a 45 angle from right to left, hovered for a few secons, then rose up again at 60-70 degree angle from right to left and disapeared in about 10-15 seconds.  next morning or day after is when i caught the video.  on the morning of 26th, came out  looking and as i scanned sky, about 10 degrees to the right, in orion, therer were 2 or 3 quick flashes of light, a pause and then a couple of more, but other than the flashes, nothing seen or heard.  worked at airports and around aircraft for 15+ years, and know what a strobe and anticollision light look like.
content.summary: This one was just a huge whie, fuzzy light.

content.detailedDescription:
The event started while on a return leg from ktul to kswo. i was in a cessna 150 at approximately 3,000ft msl hdg 270t. approximate local time was 2000 at the start of the sighting. visibility was significantly greater than 10 statute miles. temperature was approximately 85f and wind was around 3kts

on my return leg back to kswo from ktul at approximately 2000, i was following highway 51 about 20nm to the east of kswo when i noticed a very bright light brg045. approximate location of my aircraft at time of sighting was n36 06.78 w096 44.52. approximate location of object at time of sighting was n36 24.66 w096 58.62. 

i initially noticed the object during my routine scan outside the aircraft for aircraft operating in the local area. kswo was my home airport, and is also the location of a university flight school. 

the light's appearance was a brilliant white, like a large aircraft's landing light. my initial reaction was that it must be either a planet, or more likely a large aircraft in the pattern at kswo. as the sighting progressed, i began to dismiss the previous objects as it was too far below the horizon to be an astronomical object, and lacked recognition lighting that is common to all general aviation and commercial aircraft.  

during the initial part of the sighting, the object exhibited cbdr or constant bearing, decreasing range; it was heading towards my aircraft. this lasted for 15 minutes. estimated airspeed of the object at this point estimated to be less than 50kts. 

as i begin to descend into kswo at 2015, i started talking with another pilot in the vicinity of the airfield operating a powered parachute. at this point my attention went from the unidentified light, to descent and pre-landing checklists and i lost sight of the object. upon landing at the airfield at 2025, i notified the operator of the powered parachute that i would be interested in coming to look at his aircraft after i had secured mine for the evening. he accepted my offer, and i parked my aircraft and secured it for the evening.

at 2115 i drove to a nearby hanger on field at kswo to meet the operator of the powered parachute. when i arrived, he along with a friend and his son were on site. they were looking at an object through a pair of binoculars that was now directly south of our position. the 3 individuals explained that they had witnessed the object transit from above ponca city, ok....Pass stillwater, ok (kswo)....And was not observing the object (along with myself) in the vicinity of oklahoma city, ok. witnesses described the object as i had in my description earlier, and that it produced no audible noise. 

at 2120, i obtained the binoculars and looked at and re-acquired what i assess was the same object that i had sighted earlier.  approximate location of the object was now n35 40.08 w097 21.96 which was directly south and slightly west of my position which was still kswo. while looking through the binoculars i could determine the object was spherical in nature and estimated its size to be about 30ft in diameter. with the naked eye from my viewing location, it appeared to be about half the size of an aspirin held at arm's length. through the binoculars i could clearly see the object "morph" through a color pattern. this patter was similar to the lighting that you can commonly find in limousines and other entertainment events. i would describe it as "party lighting". the sphere emitted an aura of light in a cyclical manner that was predominantly red/orange and green/blue. i observed the object in this location for approximately 20 minutes until approximately 2140. during this period of observation, the object remained stationary. at approximately 2140, the object slowly "winked out" and became invisible to the naked eye as well as through binoculars. 

i feel that i was very calm and objective through the entire encounter. 

i am an expert in identifying aircraft of all types under all conditions. i was and still am unable to identify the craft/object that i witnessed. although i feel that this aircraft could be attributed to a terrestrial craft/event, i feel that this is unlikely after my observations.

i am attaching a powerpoint/pdf document illustrating my encounter. additionally, i am attaching a photo i found on the internet which most closely depicts the object that i observed.
content.summary: Multicolored orb sighted while night flying

content.detailedDescription: My dad was driving me to middle school when i caught sight of an unusual object hovering over a tennis arena. it looked like a metal bowl turned upside down without a rim. at first, i thought it was part of the tennis court that i had never seen before until it shot backwards and disappeared into the fog. i think there was a black porthole on the bottom, but i don't know for sure since it disappeared so fast. i instantly told my dad, who asked me what i thought it was. i said i had no idea. i was impressed since i am an enormous ufo fan but i have only seen one before. it was the first ufo i have ever seen that moved, and it was unlike anything i had ever witnessed before. it moved in a perfectly straight and immensely fast path.
content.summary: saw metallic hemisphere hovering, moved backwards + dissapeared quickly

content.detailedDescription: Recorded sighting.
content.summary: Observed on espn monday night football

content.detailedDescription: I wached the bright white object stable then assending up, moved over my house , i watched it over my back window. it disappeared it blinked, yellowlight in the left, and white on the right. no noise.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Watched it stable then moved up. stopped and  moved over my houwe,i watched it go over my back window.
